alert.note: Alert for Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Menominee and central Oconto Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gardner Dam Scout Camp, or 22 miles north of Shawano, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... South Branch around 635 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Gillett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Southern Oconto County
